name: WebRTB CMS plugin
author: WebRTB

sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire webrtb-cms folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘WebRTB’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with WebRTB CMS plugin? Use the support channels appropriately.

Support

sections.description: De WebRTB CMS plugin verandert uw WordPress in een WebRTB CMS.

short_description: De WebRTB CMS plugin verandert uw Wordpress in een WebRTB CMS.
description: De WebRTB CMS plugin verandert uw WordPress in een WebRTB CMS.

upgrade_notice: The current version of WebRTB CMS plugin requires WordPress 3.3 or higher. If you use older version of WordPress, you need to upgrade WordPress first.
